programme.title: Daughters of the Sexual Revolution: The Untold Story of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
programme.desc: Assinado pelo realizador nomeado para um óscar Dana Adam Shapiro, este filme intrépido apresenta-nos a história do sucesso repentino das Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders como uma metáfora para o clímax da revolução sexual dos EUA.

programme.title: Break Through
programme.desc: Uma peça encenada por estudantes de teatro torna-se num espetáculo subversivo em prol dos direitos LGBT.

programme.title: Forgetting Dad
programme.desc: Um homem sofre um pequeno acidente de carro e, uma semana depois, constrói uma nova identidade, alegando que não consegue "lembrar-se" de que é pai. Quase vinte anos depois, a sua amnésia persiste, mas não foram encontrados dano cerebral ou qualquer causa física.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Lanzarote | Fuerteventura | Gran Canaria
programme.desc: A aventura começa em Lanzarote, no espetacular Charco de la Novia, onde uma prova aquática individual emocionante determinará a formação de duas equipas de 4 concorrentes: a equipa azul e a equipa amarela. Para além disso, a prova dará ao vencedor um privilégio que terá de exercer no final do capítulo: trocar um dos membros da sua equipa por um membro da equipa adversária. Contudo, antes disso, as duas equipas irão enfrentar-se em duras provas nos Jameos del Agua, no Charco de San Ginés e no Castillo de San Gabriel, onde entrará também em jogo o Talismã de Magec, que dará imunidade a um dos membros da equipa vencedora.

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka cresceu pobre e às vezes desabrigado nas ruas de Brazzaville. A sua mãe morreu quando Serge tinha 7 anos e, aos seus 12 anos, o seu pai foi à prisão. Apesar desses obstáculos esmagadores, alcançou o seu sonho de tornar-se um campeão da NBA. Este documentário acompanha a Serge na sua viagem de volta para a República do Congo, para mostrar o troféu do campeonato da NBA, mas mais importante, partilha uma mensagem de que, através de muito trabalho e determinação, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: Episódios 7-8
programme.desc: A Tormenta de 18 Dias | Um Novo Começo

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 3 - 4
programme.desc: O primeiro desafio é criar um visual na mais importante das circunstâncias: o casamento. As noivas sabem exatamente aquilo que querem quando entram no salão. Irão escolher o seu cabeleireiro, com quem terão um diálogo para definir a sua visão. Num desafio como este, falhar está fora de questão. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Paige DeSorbo irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas infalíveis de cuidados capilares. Em seguida, os participantes irão trabalhar nos cuidados capilares, restaurando o cabelo danificado dos clientes do salão. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Paige DeSorbo irá partilhar algumas das suas dicas infalíveis de cuidados capilares.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: Fast Forward - Episode 1 - 5
programme.desc: Fusão Nuclear | Corpos Biónicos | Limpadores do Espaço | Carne Criada em Laboratório | Blockchain, protocolo da confiança

programme.title: A minha Decisão, por Andrés Iniesta
programme.desc: "São poucas as pessoas que sabem o que aconteceu quando me lesionei. Poucas sabem que tive de tomar uma decisão de enorme importância. Valia a pena continuar a jogar, ou estava na altura de parar?" Um documentário revelador sobre o lendário médio, Andrés Iniesta, quando enfrenta uma decisão crucial após uma lesão que ameaça a sua carreira. A história de um amor de longa data pelo futebol, sob a ameaça de uma situação cruel e inevitável.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Cor - Futuro
programme.desc: Os toucadores do Makeup Stars são tomados pela cor, com os concorrentes a enfrentar o primeiro desafio com a técnica de caracterização. Seguirão as instruções da maquilhadora Anna Cartés, especialista na técnica das perucas e em apagar as feições dos modelos para criar novas personagens. Agoney, um cantor camaleónico e fã da maquilhagem, visitará o programa para dar conselhos aos concorrentes. Quem será a ""Super Estrela"" e ganhará privilégios para o próximo episódio? Quem terá a pontuação mais baixa? Não percas uma explosão de cor.

programme.title: I Am Breathing
programme.desc: Num ano, Neil Platt deixa de ser um homem saudável para ficar completamente paralisado do pescoço para baixo, devido à doença devastadora que herdou.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A vencedora da Bundesliga e jogadora do AC Milan Julia Simic parte de Nuremberga para apanhar Dafina Redzepi (TSG Hoffenheim) e visitar Bärbel Wohlleben, que tem a honra de ter sido a primeira mulher que marcou um Golo do Mês da ARD Sportschau. Julia mostra-nos o campo de futebol que criou para que as raparigas possam começar a jogar, enquanto Bärbel recorda os seus anos de infância e o modo como a federação alemã de futebol (DFB) baniu as mulheres da prática do futebol profissional. As três irão jogar nas margens do Reno enquanto conversam sobre a paixão que partilham pelo futebol.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - Episódio 3-4
programme.desc: Episódio 3 - Gran Canaria | Episódio 4 - Tenerife

programme.title: In The Turn
programme.desc: “In The Turn”. Always forward and never straight. At the age of three, Crystal said that she was a girl despite being born in a boy's body. Ever since her mother bought her a skirt shortly after, a difficult journey began for Crystal, whose transition has since suffered all kinds of harassment that at the age of five led her to consider taking her own life. The discovery of "Vagine Regime", a queer collective of Roller Derby, becomes Crystal's great hope to be able to play in a team of girls, an opportunity that was always denied in her school.

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: Forgetting Dad
programme.desc: Um homem sofre um pequeno acidente de carro e, uma semana depois, constrói uma nova identidade, alegando que não consegue "lembrar-se" de que é pai. Quase vinte anos depois, a sua amnésia persiste, mas não foram encontrados dano cerebral ou qualquer causa física.

programme.title: River Memories
programme.desc: Uma comunidade está prestes a desaparecer. Os habitantes de Platz, um enorme bairro de lata em Turim, Itália, defrontam-se com um plano imposto pelo governo e veem-se ameaçados pelo despejo. Este filme documenta os últimos meses do bairro.

programme.title: The Great Journey
programme.desc: Uma família filmada por dentro. O realizador regista a luta contra o cancro da sua mãe, o anúncio de gravidez da sua irmã e as obras de renovação da sala de estar dirigidas pelo seu pai.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: Carmen Arce, "Kubalita", guarda-redes da primeira seleção nacional feminina espanhola, parte de Valencia para Barcelona para conhecer Alexia Putellas, vencedora da Liga dos Campeões da UEFA e da Supertaça Europeia, e Viktoria Adrianova, ambas jogadoras do FC Barcelona. Antes do encontro, Alexia confessa não ser tão impaciente como outrora, Viky emociona-se ao recordar a sua lesão e Kubalita afirma que elas não se esconderam, apesar de os políticos e os meios de comunicação terem subestimado a sua atividade. Assim que se reuniram, trocaram impressões sobre o momento atual do futebol feminino.

programme.title: Ettore Bassi: Stage and Race
programme.desc: O ator italiano Ettore Bassi é conhecido pelo seu trabalho no cinema, televisão e teatro. Mas nem todos sabem que também é um piloto profissional de corridas de rampa. A sua vida divide-se com frequência entre as duas paixões e dois cenários muito diferentes: o palco ou a pista. Em 2022, as duas realidades chocam quando tem agendados um espetáculo e uma corrida, em lados opostos da Itália. Bassi decide dedicar-se aos dois projetos, sabendo que o sucesso é quase impossível. A sua escolha e determinação revelam muito acerca do homem e do seu passado...

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - Episódio 3-4
programme.desc: Episódio 3 - Gran Canaria | Episódio 4 - Tenerife

programme.title: SEVE - Artista, Lutador, Lenda
programme.desc: Seve continua a ser uma lenda, um campeão multi-major, o homem responsável por fazer da moderna Ryder Cup um grande acontecimento. A sua paixão pelo golfe era tal que ainda criança esgueirava no campo para jogar à noite, futuramente faria o mesmo num esforço "para encontrar a magia". A sua história é contada por membros da sua família e do seu círculo interno, por outros grandes desportistas e através do material recentemente descoberto. É um conto hipnotizante de talento, crença e bravura - a história da vida de Seve… e da sua morte.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: Carolina Morace, em Roma, revela-se uma mulher de caráter forte, sem medo de se assumir como pioneira em qualquer domínio, como quando se torna na primeira mulher a marcar quatro golos no estádio de Wembley. Barbara Bonansea, jogadora da Juventus escolhida para a Seleção Mundial da FIFA/FIFPro de 2020, está com a sua família, incluindo a avó, que a apoiou no seu desejo de se tornar futebolista. Benedetta Orsi, jogadora noviça do US Sassuolo, fala com otimismo sobre o modo como ultrapassou a doença que a forçou a desistir do ténis mas lhe deu a oportunidade de desenvolver a sua paixão pelo futebol.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A família Flores toma o pequeno-almoço, o almoço e o jantar a pensar em futebol. As jovens irmãs Tatiana e Silvana treinam com o seu pai, um ex-jogador mexicano, e recebem dele toda a experiência de que precisam para a sua carreira. Kelly Smith, uma genuína lenda do futebol e a maior marcadora na história da seleção nacional feminina inglesa, espera por elas em sua casa. Antes de se encontrar com as irmãs Flores, partilha com as câmaras do programa os momentos mais duros da sua carreira. Entretanto, Lucy Bronze (Manchester City FC), Melhor Jogadora do Ano de 2020 da FIFA, recorda a sua carreira e partilha algumas afirmações surpreendentes.

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 3 - 4
programme.desc: O primeiro desafio é criar um visual na mais importante das circunstâncias: o casamento. As noivas sabem exatamente aquilo que querem quando entram no salão. Irão escolher o seu cabeleireiro, com quem terão um diálogo para definir a sua visão. Num desafio como este, falhar está fora de questão. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Paige DeSorbo irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas infalíveis de cuidados capilares. Em seguida, os participantes irão trabalhar nos cuidados capilares, restaurando o cabelo danificado dos clientes do salão. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Paige DeSorbo irá partilhar algumas das suas dicas infalíveis de cuidados capilares.

programme.title: Barcelona: Surf Destination
programme.desc: Em "Barcelona: Surf Destination", Ítalo Ferreira, o primeiro campeão olímpico de surf, aceita o convite do seu amigo Alex Vilalta e viaja para Barcelona para explorar a costa catalã e conhecer a comunidade de surfistas que mantém o espírito do surf aceso neste reduto mediterrâneo. Neste documentário de aventuras repletas de sol, somos convidados a partir numas férias com amigos que se reúnem para tagarelar e entregar-se àquilo que os apaixona: o surf.

programme.title: Ride your Dream
programme.desc: Motociclismo era um mundo de homens, até agora. Este documentário apresenta-nos a Ana Carrasco, a piloto espanhola que revolucionou o mundo das duas rodas e que, desde cedo, teve um sonho claro: ser campeã mundial. Por meio de conversas íntimas com a sua familia e equipa, conhecemos as motivações de Ana, os obstáculos que enfrentou e os sonhos que continua a perseguir. A sua carreira, desde as suas origens numa pequena cidade em Murcia a ser a primeira mulher a vencer um Campeonato do Mundo, é fonte de inspiração para qualquer pessoa.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Na capa - Queens
programme.desc: Neste empolgante primeiro episódio do concurso de maquilhagem, conhecemos os oito concorrentes, que se enfrentarão ao desafio de criar maquilhagem editorial à altura de uma capa de revista. Conheceremos o júri: David Molina, um dos mais famosos maquilhadores do setor; e Camila Redondo, uma das vozes mais influentes no mundo online da beleza e maquilhagem. E a rainha indiscutível do TikTok, Lola Lolita, visitará os concorrentes. Não percas este novo concurso brilhante e com muito estilo.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: Daughters of the Sexual Revolution: The Untold Story of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
programme.desc: Assinado pelo realizador nomeado para um óscar Dana Adam Shapiro, este filme intrépido apresenta-nos a história do sucesso repentino das Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders como uma metáfora para o clímax da revolução sexual dos EUA.

programme.title: River Memories
programme.desc: Uma comunidade está prestes a desaparecer. Os habitantes de Platz, um enorme bairro de lata em Turim, Itália, defrontam-se com um plano imposto pelo governo e veem-se ameaçados pelo despejo. Este filme documenta os últimos meses do bairro.

programme.title: Paradiso
programme.desc: Rafael é o projecionista do último cinema de filmes pornográficos de Madrid. Está convicto de que todos os dias pode fazer um melhor trabalho.

programme.title: Rumeysa: De cabeça erguida
programme.desc: Com 2,15 m de altura, a impressionante estatura de Rumeysa Gelgi é apenas comparável à sua assombrosa força interior. Rumeysa Gelgi nasceu com uma mutação genética rara, a síndrome de Weaver. E a vida não tem sido fácil para a mulher mais alta do mundo. Agora, graças a uma cirurgia que lhe mudou a vida, está pronta a viajar pela primeira vez aos EUA para conhecer algumas das mulheres mais inspiradoras do mundo. Na sua viagem de autodescoberta, Rumeysa contará a sua história e aprenderá junto com outras mulheres que detêm recordes do Livro Guiness.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - Episódio 1-2
programme.desc: Episódio 1 - Lanzarote | Episódio 2 - Fuerteventura

programme.title: Break Point: a Davis Cup Story
programme.desc: Liderada por Rafa Nadal, a seleção espanhola era a favorita deste ano até sofrer um sério revés. O jogador número dois da equipa, Roberto Bautista, teve de deixar a disputa para voltar à sua cidade natal e ficar ao lado do pai nas últimas horas da sua vida. Sem o Bautista, Nadal e Feliciano López conseguiram heroicamente levar a equipa à final. Mas então veio a notícia que emocionou os fãs de ténis em todo o mundo: Bautista, após o funeral do seu pai, está de volta à competição e pronto para jogar. Unidos mais uma vez, os espanhóis lutam pela vitória na grande final, onde algo muito além do ténis está em jogo.

programme.title: Djon Africa
programme.desc: Miguel ouviu dizer que se parece muito com o seu pai, a quem nunca conheceu. Nesta história acompanhamo-lo numa busca poética por esse homem desconhecido entre as memórias e mitologias africanas.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Na capa - Queens
programme.desc: Neste empolgante primeiro episódio do concurso de maquilhagem, conhecemos os oito concorrentes, que se enfrentarão ao desafio de criar maquilhagem editorial à altura de uma capa de revista. Conheceremos o júri: David Molina, um dos mais famosos maquilhadores do setor; e Camila Redondo, uma das vozes mais influentes no mundo online da beleza e maquilhagem. E a rainha indiscutível do TikTok, Lola Lolita, visitará os concorrentes. Não percas este novo concurso brilhante e com muito estilo.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A vencedora de três medalhas olímpicas e Treinadora Feminina do Ano de 2012 da FIFA Pia Sundhage conta-nos como se sentiu quando foi convocada pela primeira vez pela seleção nacional feminina sueca. Pia acredita que o futebol lhe ofereceu um modo de vida. Pia conversa com Stina Blackstenius, vencedora de uma medalha de bronze na Copa do Mundo Feminina da FIFA e vencedora de duas medalhas de prata em Jogos Olímpicos, e com Molly Johansson, ambas jogadoras do BK Häcken. Stina conversa com as duas jogadoras sobre o que sentiu quando participou nos Jogos Olímpicos, e como jogar em França a tornou mais forte, enquanto Molly revela as suas metas para o futuro.

programme.title: Episódios 1-2
programme.desc: Um Clássico de Futebol | Território Inimigo

programme.title: Gigantes - Lendas do sumo do Hawaii
programme.desc: Acompanhamos as vidas épicas das lendas do sumo que transcenderam as suas origens humildes no Havai para se tornarem nos primeiros estrangeiros a ascender aos patamares mais elevados do sumo.

programme.title: Finding Hope Home
programme.desc: Os cineastas Wambui Ndegwa e Cole Lewis tornam a realidade queniana visível através da história de uma família que começou a adotar crianças sem-abrigo no Nairobi em 1996.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Cor - Futuro
programme.desc: Os toucadores do Makeup Stars são tomados pela cor, com os concorrentes a enfrentar o primeiro desafio com a técnica de caracterização. Seguirão as instruções da maquilhadora Anna Cartés, especialista na técnica das perucas e em apagar as feições dos modelos para criar novas personagens. Agoney, um cantor camaleónico e fã da maquilhagem, visitará o programa para dar conselhos aos concorrentes. Quem será a ""Super Estrela"" e ganhará privilégios para o próximo episódio? Quem terá a pontuação mais baixa? Não percas uma explosão de cor.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 5 - 6
programme.desc: Nem sempre é fácil agradar os clientes, mas os participantes não podem desiludir. Irão indicar os seus modelos e descobrir o que querem, para concretizarem os seus desejos na máxima medida possível. A atriz, modelo e celebridade televisiva e Christine Quinn irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas de cuidados capilares com os participantes. No segundo desafio, os participantes irão trabalhar com modelos e dedicar-se à pintura de cabelo. Cada visual pode destacar a beleza natural da modelo, ao mesmo tempo que alimenta os seus cabelos, dado que as tintas podem ser prejudiciais.

programme.desc: Hits that rocked the UK's dancefloors in the 80s from the mega production trio Stock, Aitken & Waterman. Expect Kylie, Jason, Rick, Sonia & Sinitta.

programme.title: Is This Really How They Started?
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Is This Really How They Started?
programme.desc: Most went onto much bigger things - but how did it all start? Here are 25 chart & video debuts from household names - some songs are brilliant, but some you might not know!

programme.title: 1987 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made 1987!

programme.title: Coiffured! Rick v Jason
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Coiffured! Rick v Jason
programme.desc: 12 of the best hairstyles of the late 80s - these boys knew how to use a comb and a bucketful of mousse.

programme.title: 80s Eurodance! Top 25
programme.desc: 25 fabulous dance tracks from the UK and across Europe.

programme.title: 60 Summer Sizzlers! 1980-1989
programme.desc: 60 of the best feel-good summer hits! Each was a Top 10 smash across June, July & August in the '80s - on the beach, on your walkman, and at the Radio 1 Roadshow!

programme.title: 1987 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made 1987!

programme.title: The Last Days of Disco! 1980-1982
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 The Last Days of Disco! 1980-1982

programme.title: 50 Girls In Love - In The 80s
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 50 Girls In Love - In The 80s
programme.desc: From classic power ballads to life affirming love songs - 4 hours of smoochy girls, devastating divas, and pop princesses. Time to put your Hand on Your Heart and tell me.

programme.title: Hits That Missed!
programme.desc: Lesser known songs you may have forgotten from artists you'll certainly know!

programme.title: Tony Hadley's Solid Gold Anthems!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Tony Hadley's Solid Gold Anthems!
programme.desc: Tony flashes back to the 80s and picks 30 Solid Gold Anthems. Expect Blondie, ABC, Level 42, OMD, A-Ha & of course some Spandau Ballet classics.

programme.title: Chart Toppers!
programme.desc: A choice selection of the 191 singles that reached the top of the UK charts in the 1980s!

programme.title: The Power & Glory! Top 25
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 The Power & Glory! Top 25
programme.desc: They called it many daft things like 'soft metal' or 'leather and lace rock' back in the day. But we prefer to call these 25 songs, filled with power and glory, 100% perfection!

programme.title: 80s Rock Anthems!
programme.desc: Non-stop 80s rock & power ballads! From Queen, Bon Jovi & Whitesnake to Meat Loaf, Bonnie Tyler & Tina Turner.

programme.title: Phil Collins : 1981-1989

programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Mark Goodier's No.2s of 1987
programme.desc: 60 minutes of back to back UK chart runners-up from 1987 - a year of big hits for Pepsi, Percy & Pet Shop Boys! With Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.

programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1987

programme.title: Bruno's Forgotten Hits: 1987
programme.desc: Month by month Bruno Brookes plays 12 lesser known hits of 1987! Including Kim Wilde, Alison Moyet & Erasure, plus forgotten acts like Wax, Westworld & Pseudo Echo.

programme.title: Way Back When! 1987
programme.desc: 60 minutes of lesser heard hits from 1987. Including Nick Kamen, Kenny G, Climie Fisher, The Jets & Boogie Box High.

programme.title: Every Song From NOW 9 - 1987
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Every Song From NOW 9 - 1987

programme.title: Abba Gold! 1974-1979
programme.desc: Quite simply the biggest hits from the biggest pop act of the 70s - Abba. 12 songs, 7 UK number 1s.

programme.title: No.1 Air Guitar Anthems! 1970-1979
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 No.1 Air Guitar Anthems! 1970-1979
programme.desc: Dust down your air guitar, cause we've 11 rock number 1s from the 70s to strum along to! From Hendrix & Queen to Suzi Q & Dave Edmunds.

programme.title: Who Won Wot in 1971?
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Who Won Wot in 1971?
programme.desc: Mark Goodier with 1971's big music award winners. Who was 'Best Newcomer' at the Grammys & which comedian got the coveted UK Christmas Number 1?

programme.title: Hamilton's Hotshots! Top 30

programme.title: Summer Loving!
programme.desc: Non-stop summer love songs, back to back, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees & Minnie Ripperton.

programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 NOW 100 Hits: Love Songs!

programme.title: Summer Loving!
programme.desc: Non-stop summer love songs, back to back, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees & Minnie Ripperton.

programme.title: What The Heck Kept This Off No.1?
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 What The Heck Kept This Off No.1?
programme.desc: Every one of these superb No.2 hits from 1970-1979 is a classic, but what other songs stopped each of them getting to the top? Queen, Ringo, Elton, Boney M and more are all here!

programme.title: Tony Blackburn's 70s Soul!
programme.desc: Slick ballads, funky beats & soulful disco - Tony has the lot in a 2 hour session of sensational 70s soul!

programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Rocket Man! Elton in the 70s
programme.desc: His national treasure status has grown with time, and every one of these songs is now considered a classic. These are Elton's big hits in order from 1971's "Your Song" onwards.

programme.title: The 1976 POWER Hour with Bam!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 The 1976 POWER Hour with Bam!
programme.desc: 60 minutes of power pop & rock! Earplugs at the ready as we rewind to 1976 with Genesis, Thin Lizzy, Peter Frampton & The Sex Pistols!

programme.title: Blue Sky Belters! 1970-1979
programme.desc: Bringing the sunshine to you - 70s style! Every vid is full of outdoor fun - with Dr Hook & ELO, Elton & Abba, Bee Gees & Boney M!

programme.title: The Summer of 76!
programme.desc: The most famous heatwave of the century was in 1976 & these are the red hot hits that soundtracked that summer! Including Dancing Queen, Jeans On, Devil Woman & Combine Harvester.

programme.title: That's Not My Name! 1970-1979
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 That's Not My Name! 1970-1979
programme.desc: LaDonna Gaines, Marvin Aday & Henry Deutschendorf Jr. were 3 of the world's biggest stars of the 70s - but all went under snappier (& better!) showbiz names for their music careers

programme.title: Tony Blackburn's Pop Party! 70-75
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Tony Blackburn's Pop Party! 70-75
programme.desc: Blackburn's your man for the ultimate early 70s party playlist. How about some pure pop cheese from big names & forgotten acts that'll have you singing your head off? Let's bop!

programme.title: The 5 O'Clock Groovy Zone!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 The 5 O'Clock Groovy Zone!

programme.title: Around The World! 1970-1979

programme.title: Deep Blue Aquarium

programme.desc: Recap and Forecast on the projects we have in the shop. Install new drivetrain and chassis on Buick Project Street Regal.

programme.title: Carcass
programme.desc: The Carcass Duo find a left for dead tow truck that they want to give a new life through fabrication and a little imagination.

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: The '74 Glencoe Jet Boat receives a 540 cu big block designed for high-speed fun on the water.

programme.desc: The Detroit Muscle team begins their journey of bringing a '69 Plymouth Road Runner back from the brink. The first step, upping its ground game.

programme.title: Carcass
programme.desc: We have a new project that has a unique lineage in the motorsports world. We bring in a Datsun 280Z and take a look at how it handles on the road and how much power the 2.8 liter makes before we start stripping it down to begin our heritage transformation. Plus, we'll check out the future of automotive innovation at an electrifying event.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: The guys bring in help to progress body work on the 1969 Dodge Charger.

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: Searching for more power, let's add Nitrous and see what happens when our Chevy small block gets on the bottle!

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: Performance upgrades on our 6.7L Ram continue with install of larger intercooler, & gauges. Plus how to smoke taillights for a cool accent.

programme.title: Music City Trucks
programme.desc: We upgrade the brakes, repair underside problems, and put some great new off-road and recovery mods on our 2007 Jeep Wrangler JK. Then we'll take it out for a wheeling adventure.

programme.title: Carcass
programme.desc: The Carcass crew gives you some tips on how to repair rusty trouble spots and remove dents on your project. Then we'll walk you through getting it ready for primer.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Food Fact Fun Vancouver, Canada
programme.desc: Alex starts his Vancouver exploration by visiting Bridges restaurant where he tries smoked salmon pizza with some seafood. Then he visits the Richmond Night Market and then Treasure Cafe. Later visits the Steel Toad Brewery in Olympic Village. Next he explores the Gastown, including the steam clock. Further he explores the Hills Native Art ending with Vancouver observation deck. Next he rides on board the Grouse Mountain Skyride, ending with Capilano Suspension Bridge park.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: In the Troodos ranges of Cyprus, Sabrina Chakici visits the Kykkos Monastery and the ten small village churches, which have become a UNESCO World Heritage Site. She further ventures out to explore the Neolithic village of Khirokitia and learn about the age-old lace tradition in Lefkara village.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Food Fact Fun Toronto, Canada
programme.desc: Vietnamese sandwich shop is Alex’s first stop in Toronto where he tries the Kimchi fries. Further explores the Market 707 for some asian food shops. Next he visits the Casa Loma castle and then Sir Henry’s garage for classic cars and finally explores and interacts with shopkeepers in Saint Lauren’s Market. Next, Alex in Ontario exploring the place on Segway. For some adventure, he then tries Skydiving at iFLY and to end his day with paddle boating.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: In her final leg of the journey Sabrina uncover the mysteries of the ancient temples of Luxor, Aswan and Abu Simbel paired with the Monastery of Catherine atop Mt. Sinai.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 City Breaks Bukhara, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: One of Uzbekistan’s most ancient cities, Bukhara was a popular town even during the days of the Silk Route trading. Built atop a constellation of small oases here weary desert travelers could find water and rest. Through its madrassahs, minarets, a massive royal fortress and the remnants of a once-vast market complex, Alex Outhwaite soaks in the vibes of the Central Asia of yore.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Lying next to the island's beautiful Mediterranean coastline, in south-western Cyprus, the popular town of Paphos is home to some spectacular archaeological attractions and a rich Cypriot history. Here, Sabrina discovers the myths of the Greek and Roman philosophies, unravels the stories hidden in time at Paphos Archaeological Park, and explores the historic towns of Limassol and Kourion.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Food Fact Fun Niagara, Canada
programme.desc: Alex starts in Niagara with a 5 course meal along with enjoying dance performances near the Niagara falls. Next, exploring the urban space, he visits the Skylon town for a stunning view of the city. Further he visits the Niagara-on-the-lake village and explores its surroundings. He then interacts with a wine expert to learn more about the regional wines. Lastly, Alex is seen exploring the Niagara falls by helicopter, the a tunnel that takes him to the observation desk and then by ferry.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici marvels at the architectural wonders of Baku, the capital of Azerbaijan, while also checking out souvenirs at the local bazaar.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 1, Maldives
programme.desc: A trip to Maldives is like a voyage to a big blue water wonderland. A villa with a floor, which offers clear views of the turquoise ocean and exquisite marine life underfoot, enhances this experience for Kim, during her visit. She pampers herself further with an underwater spa treatment and a bottle of wine from an underground wine cellar, which is like a treasure cave for wine connoisseurs around the world.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Food Fact Fun Vancouver, Canada
programme.desc: Alex starts his Vancouver exploration by visiting Bridges restaurant where he tries smoked salmon pizza with some seafood. Then he visits the Richmond Night Market and then Treasure Cafe. Later visits the Steel Toad Brewery in Olympic Village. Next he explores the Gastown, including the steam clock. Further he explores the Hills Native Art ending with Vancouver observation deck. Next he rides on board the Grouse Mountain Skyride, ending with Capilano Suspension Bridge park.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Azerbaijan has many natural wonders, which could amaze a traveler. From physical mud volcanoes to striking rock formations, Sabrina Chakici witnesses a few of them at Gobustan National Park. Following this, she reaches the city of Ganja, where she uncovers the history at spectacular places such as Heyder Aliyev Park, Mausoleum Imamzadeh, Juma Mosque and Mausoleum Nizami.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 2, Maldives
programme.desc: The warm, cerulean waters of Maldives are home to an endless variety of exotic marine life and colourful coral reefs. During Kim’s visit, she tries out diving and finds herself transported to another world altogether, where the lines between fantasy and reality begin to blur. A chance to feed sting rays adds to the magic of her experiences at this tropical utopia.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.desc: Considering the reputation Singapore has for being a glitzy, fast-paced, ultra-urbanized city, Sukhmani is surprised at the number of natural spots it offers. She visits the Jurong Bird Park, Asia's largest, with a collection of over 5,000 birds from birds of prey to penguins, and Sentosa Island, where she gets a chance to see around 2500 marine creatures at an oceanarium called the “Underwater World”.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Food Fact Fun Vancouver Island, Canada
programme.desc: Alex is in Vancouver Island and calls for Saffron salmon at Modern Cafe. Next he visits “Red fish blue fish” a fish and chip shop and tries freshly prepared seafood. Further explores the Parksville beach for its sand sculptures and then explores a 50 year old Symphony Winery. Further Alex visits “Eagle wing whale watching” for fun and knowledge about the ocean life. To add to the adventure rush he tries motocross and then snorkels in cold waters of Nanaimo.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sheki, the silk route city of Azerbaijan, is all kinds of indulgence, as Sabrina Chakici finds out. She learns about the unique play of colour and glass that is Shabaka, a traditional art form, and sees how beautifully it has been used in the mesmerizing Sheki Summer House. She also pampers herself with a relaxing crude oil spa treatment, and goes on to explore Khinalug Village, a hidden gem.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 World Spas Fusion Maia
programme.desc: Natural Living Massage, one of the signature treatments at the Fusion Maia all-inclusive spa resort in Da Nang, Vietnam, is a combination of eastern healing and aromatherapy. Jamie Srubis tries this along with other treatments such as a lymphatic warm bamboo massage, which is good for detoxing, and Mindful Energy, a spa treatment that combines reiki with a head massage session.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.desc: The Singapore Zoo is one of the world's most inviting, enlightening animal sanctuaries, where open-air enclosures allow for both freedom for the animals to roam and unobstructed visitor views. From an exciting jungle breakfast surrounded by exotic animals to the magical Night Safari, the world’s first nocturnal zoo, Sukhmani’s experiences at the zoo leave her with the same craze for wildlife that Singapore is known to possess.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Food Fact Fun Whistler, Canada
programme.desc: Alex starts with Kangaroo meat pie in Whistler with a Australian ginger beer and continuing his food trail he visits Earls kitchen for a tuna dish. He then tries out e-biking and travels in the world’s highest cable car joining Blackcomb with Whistler mountain. Next, he visits Squamish lil’wat cultural center to learn about the Aboriginal people. Finally, he takes a tour of Pemberton valley on a horse, tries Canada’s highest zipline and bungee jumps over the Cheakamus river.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.desc: Looking for a break from the chaos and stress of city life, Asmita decides to visit Haridwar, a place which she had last visited with her family as a child. Wanting to recreate those blissful moments, she heads off to this town nestled on the banks of the mighty river Ganga, where pilgrims and weary souls come to find respite. Little does she know that, in her short stay there, the town is going to open her eyes to the joys of slow living.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.desc: Cyprus seduces travelers effortlessly with the charm of a sunny Mediterranean seaside country. When they explore more of it, though, they find the vividly painted Byzantine churches in the Troodos ranges, which reveal the Greek roots of Cyprus. The role it played in human evolution unfolds at the archaeological treasure troves of Khirokitia and Paphos. A tryst with the heritage of Cyprus unravels the stories of one of the oldest civilizations in the Mediterranean.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Larnaca in Cyprus is one of the world’s 20 most ancient, continuously inhabited cities for the last 4000 years. Travel enthusiast, Sabrina sets out to find out more about the city but is waylaid when she finds a flock of flamingos at a lake side.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Montreal, Canada
programme.desc: Alex starts his day in Montreal where he tries beers at La Succursale. Notre Dame Basilique Church is his next point of exploration, and then he visits Mount Royal Park. After this, he goes to the Old Montreal part of the city, where he explores the St. paul’s street, city hall and Jacques-Cartier square. Further, he visits Atrium Le Mille to watch ice-skating and to end with, he explores the Jean Talon open market.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina starts her backpacking journey in Egypt from the capital Cairo, evenly painted in the shades of ancient islamic and modern architecture.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Once an ancient city on the famous Silk Road, Tashkent is a kaleidoscope of mesmerizing art, delectable food, sweeping gardens and eye-catching architecture. Renowned traveller, Alex Outhwaite explores the Uzbekistan capital, where she visits iconic sights such as the Barak-Khan Madrassah, learns about the city’s history, and tries out some local delicacies such as sheesh kebab, horse milk and horse meat.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Nicosia, the capital of the Republic of Cyprus is also its cultural heartbeat. Sabrina realizes this, as she sets out to unravel the stories of the largest city in Cyprus while being treated to a bath in a Hammam, which was formerly a church.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Quebec, Canada
programme.desc: Aux Anciens Canadiens in Quebec is known for its Deer meat pie so Alex starts with trying it and then tastes of chocolates. He later introduces Rue Du Tresor street and later he is seen on Quartier Petit Champlain street. Wrapping up, he visits Parc de la chute-Montmorency waterfalls where tourists enjoy photography, cable-car ride and walk on a suspended bridge between cliffs.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Continuing her journey, Sabrina explores Alexandria, a perfect amalgamation of modern culture and traditional arts. From the Royal Library to the glorious Citadel on the Mediterranean coast.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 City Breaks Samarkand, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: Samarkand, one of the most popular cities of Uzbekistan, is a city littered with monuments, which span a thousand years of history. From the stories of the Silk Road to the life of the legendary king, Timur, Alex Outhwaite learns about the long, rich history of Samarkand through some of its iconic attractions.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: In the Troodos ranges of Cyprus, Sabrina Chakici visits the Kykkos Monastery and the ten small village churches, which have become a UNESCO World Heritage Site. She further ventures out to explore the Neolithic village of Khirokitia and learn about the age-old lace tradition in Lefkara village.

programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici marvels at the architectural wonders of Baku, the capital of Azerbaijan, while also checking out souvenirs at the local bazaar.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Lying next to the island's beautiful Mediterranean coastline, in south-western Cyprus, the popular town of Paphos is home to some spectacular archaeological attractions and a rich Cypriot history. Here, Sabrina discovers the myths of the Greek and Roman philosophies, unravels the stories hidden in time at Paphos Archaeological Park, and explores the historic towns of Limassol and Kourion.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 1, Maldives
programme.desc: A trip to Maldives is like a voyage to a big blue water wonderland. A villa with a floor, which offers clear views of the turquoise ocean and exquisite marine life underfoot, enhances this experience for Kim, during her visit. She pampers herself further with an underwater spa treatment and a bottle of wine from an underground wine cellar, which is like a treasure cave for wine connoisseurs around the world.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Food Fact Fun Niagara, Canada
programme.desc: Alex starts in Niagara with a 5 course meal along with enjoying dance performances near the Niagara falls. Next, exploring the urban space, he visits the Skylon town for a stunning view of the city. Further he visits the Niagara-on-the-lake village and explores its surroundings. He then interacts with a wine expert to learn more about the regional wines. Lastly, Alex is seen exploring the Niagara falls by helicopter, the a tunnel that takes him to the observation desk and then by ferry.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Azerbaijan has many natural wonders, which could amaze a traveler. From physical mud volcanoes to striking rock formations, Sabrina Chakici witnesses a few of them at Gobustan National Park. Following this, she reaches the city of Ganja, where she uncovers the history at spectacular places such as Heyder Aliyev Park, Mausoleum Imamzadeh, Juma Mosque and Mausoleum Nizami.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 2, Maldives
programme.desc: The warm, cerulean waters of Maldives are home to an endless variety of exotic marine life and colourful coral reefs. During Kim’s visit, she tries out diving and finds herself transported to another world altogether, where the lines between fantasy and reality begin to blur. A chance to feed sting rays adds to the magic of her experiences at this tropical utopia.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Food Fact Fun Vancouver, Canada
programme.desc: Alex starts his Vancouver exploration by visiting Bridges restaurant where he tries smoked salmon pizza with some seafood. Then he visits the Richmond Night Market and then Treasure Cafe. Later visits the Steel Toad Brewery in Olympic Village. Next he explores the Gastown, including the steam clock. Further he explores the Hills Native Art ending with Vancouver observation deck. Next he rides on board the Grouse Mountain Skyride, ending with Capilano Suspension Bridge park.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sheki, the silk route city of Azerbaijan, is all kinds of indulgence, as Sabrina Chakici finds out. She learns about the unique play of colour and glass that is Shabaka, a traditional art form, and sees how beautifully it has been used in the mesmerizing Sheki Summer House. She also pampers herself with a relaxing crude oil spa treatment, and goes on to explore Khinalug Village, a hidden gem.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.desc: Considering the reputation Singapore has for being a glitzy, fast-paced, ultra-urbanized city, Sukhmani is surprised at the number of natural spots it offers. She visits the Jurong Bird Park, Asia's largest, with a collection of over 5,000 birds from birds of prey to penguins, and Sentosa Island, where she gets a chance to see around 2500 marine creatures at an oceanarium called the “Underwater World”.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 World Spas Fusion Maia
programme.desc: Natural Living Massage, one of the signature treatments at the Fusion Maia all-inclusive spa resort in Da Nang, Vietnam, is a combination of eastern healing and aromatherapy. Jamie Srubis tries this along with other treatments such as a lymphatic warm bamboo massage, which is good for detoxing, and Mindful Energy, a spa treatment that combines reiki with a head massage session.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Food Fact Fun Vancouver Island, Canada
programme.desc: Alex is in Vancouver Island and calls for Saffron salmon at Modern Cafe. Next he visits “Red fish blue fish” a fish and chip shop and tries freshly prepared seafood. Further explores the Parksville beach for its sand sculptures and then explores a 50 year old Symphony Winery. Further Alex visits “Eagle wing whale watching” for fun and knowledge about the ocean life. To add to the adventure rush he tries motocross and then snorkels in cold waters of Nanaimo.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.desc: Looking for a break from the chaos and stress of city life, Asmita decides to visit Haridwar, a place which she had last visited with her family as a child. Wanting to recreate those blissful moments, she heads off to this town nestled on the banks of the mighty river Ganga, where pilgrims and weary souls come to find respite. Little does she know that, in her short stay there, the town is going to open her eyes to the joys of slow living.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.desc: The Singapore Zoo is one of the world's most inviting, enlightening animal sanctuaries, where open-air enclosures allow for both freedom for the animals to roam and unobstructed visitor views. From an exciting jungle breakfast surrounded by exotic animals to the magical Night Safari, the world’s first nocturnal zoo, Sukhmani’s experiences at the zoo leave her with the same craze for wildlife that Singapore is known to possess.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.desc: Cyprus seduces travelers effortlessly with the charm of a sunny Mediterranean seaside country. When they explore more of it, though, they find the vividly painted Byzantine churches in the Troodos ranges, which reveal the Greek roots of Cyprus. The role it played in human evolution unfolds at the archaeological treasure troves of Khirokitia and Paphos. A tryst with the heritage of Cyprus unravels the stories of one of the oldest civilizations in the Mediterranean.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Food Fact Fun Whistler, Canada
programme.desc: Alex starts with Kangaroo meat pie in Whistler with a Australian ginger beer and continuing his food trail he visits Earls kitchen for a tuna dish. He then tries out e-biking and travels in the world’s highest cable car joining Blackcomb with Whistler mountain. Next, he visits Squamish lil’wat cultural center to learn about the Aboriginal people. Finally, he takes a tour of Pemberton valley on a horse, tries Canada’s highest zipline and bungee jumps over the Cheakamus river.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina starts her backpacking journey in Egypt from the capital Cairo, evenly painted in the shades of ancient islamic and modern architecture.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Larnaca in Cyprus is one of the world’s 20 most ancient, continuously inhabited cities for the last 4000 years. Travel enthusiast, Sabrina sets out to find out more about the city but is waylaid when she finds a flock of flamingos at a lake side.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Once an ancient city on the famous Silk Road, Tashkent is a kaleidoscope of mesmerizing art, delectable food, sweeping gardens and eye-catching architecture. Renowned traveller, Alex Outhwaite explores the Uzbekistan capital, where she visits iconic sights such as the Barak-Khan Madrassah, learns about the city’s history, and tries out some local delicacies such as sheesh kebab, horse milk and horse meat.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Montreal, Canada
programme.desc: Alex starts his day in Montreal where he tries beers at La Succursale. Notre Dame Basilique Church is his next point of exploration, and then he visits Mount Royal Park. After this, he goes to the Old Montreal part of the city, where he explores the St. paul’s street, city hall and Jacques-Cartier square. Further, he visits Atrium Le Mille to watch ice-skating and to end with, he explores the Jean Talon open market.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Continuing her journey, Sabrina explores Alexandria, a perfect amalgamation of modern culture and traditional arts. From the Royal Library to the glorious Citadel on the Mediterranean coast.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Nicosia, the capital of the Republic of Cyprus is also its cultural heartbeat. Sabrina realizes this, as she sets out to unravel the stories of the largest city in Cyprus while being treated to a bath in a Hammam, which was formerly a church.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 City Breaks Samarkand, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: Samarkand, one of the most popular cities of Uzbekistan, is a city littered with monuments, which span a thousand years of history. From the stories of the Silk Road to the life of the legendary king, Timur, Alex Outhwaite learns about the long, rich history of Samarkand through some of its iconic attractions.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Quebec, Canada
programme.desc: Aux Anciens Canadiens in Quebec is known for its Deer meat pie so Alex starts with trying it and then tastes of chocolates. He later introduces Rue Du Tresor street and later he is seen on Quartier Petit Champlain street. Wrapping up, he visits Parc de la chute-Montmorency waterfalls where tourists enjoy photography, cable-car ride and walk on a suspended bridge between cliffs.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: In her final leg of the journey Sabrina uncover the mysteries of the ancient temples of Luxor, Aswan and Abu Simbel paired with the Monastery of Catherine atop Mt. Sinai.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: In the Troodos ranges of Cyprus, Sabrina Chakici visits the Kykkos Monastery and the ten small village churches, which have become a UNESCO World Heritage Site. She further ventures out to explore the Neolithic village of Khirokitia and learn about the age-old lace tradition in Lefkara village.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 City Breaks Bukhara, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: One of Uzbekistan’s most ancient cities, Bukhara was a popular town even during the days of the Silk Route trading. Built atop a constellation of small oases here weary desert travelers could find water and rest. Through its madrassahs, minarets, a massive royal fortress and the remnants of a once-vast market complex, Alex Outhwaite soaks in the vibes of the Central Asia of yore.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Food Fact Fun Toronto, Canada
programme.desc: Vietnamese sandwich shop is Alex’s first stop in Toronto where he tries the Kimchi fries. Further explores the Market 707 for some asian food shops. Next he visits the Casa Loma castle and then Sir Henry’s garage for classic cars and finally explores and interacts with shopkeepers in Saint Lauren’s Market. Next, Alex in Ontario exploring the place on Segway. For some adventure, he then tries Skydiving at iFLY and to end his day with paddle boating.

programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici marvels at the architectural wonders of Baku, the capital of Azerbaijan, while also checking out souvenirs at the local bazaar.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try some adventurous activities at Mount Aso, the caldera that is home to Japan’s most active volcano.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: There is no better place to feel ‘duende’, the spirit and passion of Spain than its lively capital, Madrid. Alex catches some of the city’s infectious liveliness at its bustling squares such as Puerto del Sol and Plaza Mayor. She experiences the Spaniards’ love for food as she tucks into authentic Spanish churros. She also finds out about the city’s rich and complex history at places such as Cathedral de la Almudena and Madrid’s Royal Palace.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 City Breaks Jaipur, India
programme.desc: A quick escape to Jaipur introduces Asmita to the stark contrast in the old and new sides of Rajasthan’s capital city. On the one hand, she has a tryst with the global cosmopolis that attracts business and luxury travelers from all over the world. On the other hand, the regal monuments of the region reveal to her the stories of the kings who built them.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Tallinn, Estonia’s capital, is known for its quaint, medieval Old Town but Italian nomad couple, Marco and Erica discover other sides to the city by visiting offbeat attractions such as the Seaplane Harbour Museum and Telliskivi Creative City, a hub of artists. They also tuck into a medieval feast at Olde Hansa Inn. Following this, they have an off-roading adventure at Aidu oil shale quarry.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Boarding Pass Helsinki, Finland
programme.desc: Renowned journalist and traveler, Emeline Nsingi Nkosi visits the colourful, clean and minimalist seaside city of Helsinki, the capital of Finland. Here, she explores the iconic attractions, right from magnificent historical fortresses and monuments to churches and libraries with groundbreaking design. She finds out that Helsinki offers a fascinating journey through centuries of evolving architecture and style. She also pampers herself at a Finnish sauna.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Levi offers all the excitement and comforts for a truly memorable holiday in Lapland’s wilderness. It is, however, the local ways of life that attract Emeline Nsingi Nkosi, as she joins the residents of Levi in foraging, cooking and eating, and learns from them about Sisu - the Finnish secret to happiness. Following this, she goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder, who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer in Finland.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try some adventurous activities at Mount Aso, the caldera that is home to Japan’s most active volcano.

programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Tallinn, Estonia’s capital, is known for its quaint, medieval Old Town but Italian nomad couple, Marco and Erica discover other sides to the city by visiting offbeat attractions such as the Seaplane Harbour Museum and Telliskivi Creative City, a hub of artists. They also tuck into a medieval feast at Olde Hansa Inn. Following this, they have an off-roading adventure at Aidu oil shale quarry.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Boarding Pass Helsinki, Finland
programme.desc: Renowned journalist and traveler, Emeline Nsingi Nkosi visits the colourful, clean and minimalist seaside city of Helsinki, the capital of Finland. Here, she explores the iconic attractions, right from magnificent historical fortresses and monuments to churches and libraries with groundbreaking design. She finds out that Helsinki offers a fascinating journey through centuries of evolving architecture and style. She also pampers herself at a Finnish sauna.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Levi offers all the excitement and comforts for a truly memorable holiday in Lapland’s wilderness. It is, however, the local ways of life that attract Emeline Nsingi Nkosi, as she joins the residents of Levi in foraging, cooking and eating, and learns from them about Sisu - the Finnish secret to happiness. Following this, she goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder, who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer in Finland.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try some adventurous activities at Mount Aso, the caldera that is home to Japan’s most active volcano.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: There is no better place to feel ‘duende’, the spirit and passion of Spain than its lively capital, Madrid. Alex catches some of the city’s infectious liveliness at its bustling squares such as Puerto del Sol and Plaza Mayor. She experiences the Spaniards’ love for food as she tucks into authentic Spanish churros. She also finds out about the city’s rich and complex history at places such as Cathedral de la Almudena and Madrid’s Royal Palace.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 City Breaks Jaipur, India
programme.desc: A quick escape to Jaipur introduces Asmita to the stark contrast in the old and new sides of Rajasthan’s capital city. On the one hand, she has a tryst with the global cosmopolis that attracts business and luxury travelers from all over the world. On the other hand, the regal monuments of the region reveal to her the stories of the kings who built them.

programme.desc: With a fleeting weather window and the season coming to a close, Babsi Zangerl and Jacopo Larcher must conquer countless hard pitches in freezing temps to finish what they started.

programme.title: Red Bull Cliff Diving - Stop 1 Greece
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Red Bull Cliff Diving - Stop 1 Greece
programme.desc: The iconic Red Bull Cliff Diving World Series is back for its 15th season, returning to where it all began - Athens, Greece, the site of the inaugural finale event in 2009.

programme.title: Red Bull Cliff Diving stop #2 Boston
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Red Bull Cliff Diving stop #2 Boston
programme.desc: The World Series returns to the sports-crazed city of Boston and the platform atop the Institute of Contemporary Art for a 3rd year. The best cliff divers in the world dive from heights up to 90 feet.

programme.title: Red Bull Cliff Diving - Stop 3 Italy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Red Bull Cliff Diving - Stop 3 Italy
programme.desc: The Red Bull Cliff Diving World Series is back in Polignano a Mare, Italy, for the 13th time, featuring breathtaking dives from stunning cliffs into the blue waters below.

programme.title: Red Bull Cliff Diving - Stop 4 Northern Ireland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Red Bull Cliff Diving - Stop 4 Northern Ireland
programme.desc: The ultimate cliff diving event took place as Northern Ireland welcomed the world's top divers to a challenging location with three distinct dive spots, testing their skills and courage.

programme.title: Bang on Time
programme.desc: Freeskiers and wingsuit pilots come together in a world premiere. As skiers perform tricks, they’ll be accompanied by the Red Bull Skydive Team performing an airborne spin-and-flip at the same time.

programme.title: Mission to the Edge of Space
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mission to the Edge of Space
programme.desc: The team behind the Red Bull Stratos mission battles mechanical failures, hostile weather, and internal demons to make Felix Baumgartner's historic jump possible.

programme.title: BTCC
programme.sub-title: S00 : E07 On The Limit S4 E7 | Timing is Key | BTCC 2023
programme.desc: They say if its not raining at Knockhill, its about to be. How true that is as the BTCC heads to Scotland for the seventh round of the Championship.

programme.title: E-Xplorer FIM World Cup
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E01 E-Xplorer FIM World Cup // Osaka, Japan // Episode 1
programme.desc: Honda Racing Corporation (Team HRC) has claimed victory in its native Japan at the opening round of the 2024 FIM E-Xplorer World Cup, stamping its authority in electric off-road racing in only its first competition.

programme.title: Hypercar’s Golden Age – WEC 2023 Season Review
programme.desc: The much anticipated 2023 World Endurance season promised larger grids and more manufacturer support as teams like Ferrari, Peugeot, Porsche and Cadillac all joined the Hypercar class in hopes of challenging Toyota for top honors. While Ferrari managed to make history in winning the centenary running of Le Mans, it was a season of learnings up and down the grid as Toyota won their 5th straight Drivers and Manufacturers Championships.

programme.title: F1 2024 The Season So Far - Surprises and Disappointments
programme.desc: From what seemed like a forgone conclusion at the start of the season, with Max Verstappen and Red Bull winning 7 of the 10 opening races, has quickly turned on its head with the rest of the field fast approaching. With the early season pace of Ferrari faltering, and McLaren charging to the head of the field to challenge Red Bull, and Mercedes coming up as well, this is the review of the first half of the 2024 Formula 1 season.

programme.desc: Clare gets to ride the Suzuki V-Strom 1050 XT, but do it's retro rally looks match the engine? Tales from the Trails has the lads get the sidecar onto the Trans Euro Trail, before visiting a race track. programme.desc: When you hear the name Remy, the first people climbers generally think of are Claude and Yves. For more than thirty years, Mammut has supported and accompanied the two climbers with their projects.

programme.title: Episode 33
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024 - Episode 33

programme.title: King of the Court 2023 - #02
programme.desc: Beachvolleyball der WeltklasseZum dritten Mal in Folge ist Hamburg Gastgeber eines Queen & King of the Court-Turniers. Vom 25. bis 28. Mai werden wieder die Besten der Besten in die Hafenstadt an der Elbe reisen, um die Titel der Königinnen und Könige zu erkämpfen.

programme.title: Golden Roof Challenge 2023 - Innsbruck (AUT)
programme.desc: Die Golden Roof Challenge, Home of the Golden Fly Series, ist eine weltbekannte Stabhochsprung- und Weitsprungsveranstaltung. Sie wird am 7. Juni zum 19. Mal im Herzen von Innsbruck, Österreich, ausgetragen.

programme.title: ITF Beach Tennis World Tour 2023 - Brasilia Classic 2023 (BRA)
programme.desc: Nach einem spannenden Mai, in dem die Sand Series Gran Canaria Classic und die Beach Tennis World Championships in zwei aufeinanderfolgenden Wochen stattfanden, reisen die Spielerinnen nach Brasilien zur dritten Ausgabe der Sand Series Brasilia Classic.

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour - Vieste (ITA)
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge besuchen wir die European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 im italienischen Vieste. Die Windsurfer werden ihr Können auf dem Wasser zeigen und uns ein wenig Wassersport-Action auf dem Mittelmeer bieten.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2019 - WOMEN Race Summary - Cape Town (RSA)
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route takes amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through approximately 700km of unspoilt scenery and 15 000m of accumulated climbing.

programme.title: Mbuzi Dume - Strong Goat - Kilimandscharo (TZN)
programme.desc: Tom Belz faced the challenge of his life: The 31-year-old has gone through life with one leg and two crutches since contracting bone cancer as a child, scaled Kilimanjaro in Tanzania, Africa’s highest mountain.

programme.title: WES E-Bike World Series #1 & #2
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge werfen wir einen Blick auf die erste und zweite Runde der World E-Bike Series 2023 in Monaco und Bologna, Italien. Aber wer kann die Rennen der Männer und Frauen gewinnen? Lasst es uns herausfinden!

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Mid Season Recap
programme.desc: Die ersten Events der European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 sind vorbei und wir werfen einen Blick zurück auf die besten Windsurfer der Welt und ihre epischen Tricks auf dem Wasser.

programme.title: Ötztaler Radmarathon 2023
programme.desc: Der Ötztaler Radmarathon 2023 (AUT) ist der anspruchsvollste Radmarathon der Alpen und besticht durch seinen Mix aus Tal- und Hochgebirgslandschaften, die zu einer einzigartigen Atmosphäre beitragen.

programme.title: Mystic Skate Cup 2023
programme.desc: In dieser Episode ist es soweit: Der Mystic Skate Cup 2023 in Prag, Tschechische Republik, steht vor der Tür. Einige der besten Skateboarder der Welt werden ihr Können zeigen und das Event zu einem Spektakel machen. Werfen wir einen Blick darauf!

programme.title: A Plea For Refuge
programme.desc: Two adventurous friends, Jeff Shapiro and Cody Tuttle, have a desire to experience one of the last, raw, and truly preserved wilderness areas on the North American continent, attempt to hike and fly paraglider's across the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Donovan Wisse (20-1, 10 KO) puts his middleweight championship on the line against number one contender Ulric Bokeme (32-4, 17 KO) in the main event of the evening. Wisse is one of the top P4P kickboxers on the planet today and is chasing his fourth straight title defense. After his Grand Prix heroics, the number one ranked heavyweight Levi Rigters (17-2, 8 KO) returns to action to take on dangerous late notice replacement Nico Pereira Horta (22-8, 3 KO) in the co-main event. The ‘King of The Hague’ crown is up for grabs when rivals Michael Boapeah (16-4-1, 7 KO) and Serkan Ozcaglayan (45-9, 36 KO) clash. The two top middleweights meet in this local derby match-up where the winner walks...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E04 GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: The eight-man one-night GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix will crown the baddest light heavyweight striker on the planet. The eight participants are: GLORY champion, #C Tarik Khbabez (58-10-1, 28 KO), Morocco. Former champion, #1 Donegi Abena (27-10, 7 KO), Suriname. Former champion, #2 Sergej Maslobojev (38-6, 23 KO), Lithuania. Undefeated in GLORY, #3 Stefan Latescu (17-2, 8 KO), Romania. ‘Mister Cool’ #4 Ibrahim El Bouni (41-9-1, 22 KO), Morocco. The wild & unpredictable, #5 Bahram Rajabzadeh (67-2, 59 KO), Azerbaijan. Top French light heavyweight, #6 Pascal Toure (20-6, 7 KO), France. Veteran fighter, #7 Bogdan Stoica (58-14, 40 KO), Romania.

programme.title: HKFC 44 - Arjan Bhullar v. Jon-Taine Hall
programme.desc: Professional and Amateur fighters from across North America battle it out in Hard Knocks' cage. Arjan Bhullar v. Jon-Taine Hall.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Vladimir Zenin posts an incredible record, but Nick Agallar is ready for him. Battle hardened from serving in Iraq, this Milwakee brawler will have to be ready for whatever the Red Devil can throw his way. One of the most experienced fighters in the series, Nick Thompson has the scars to prove it. Ansar Chalangov will be looking to come out hard for the Russians. Tara LaRosa solidified her reputation as one of the top female fighters in Mixed Martial Arts in Series 1.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Diego Gonzalez attenmpts to go to the ground while his opponent Matt Thorpe tries to keep the fight on the feet. In this episode's other fight, veteran fighter Derrick Noble takes on the well-rounded Jake Ellenberger, and American martial artist from Omaha, Bebraska.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Tyler 'TNT' Jackson puts his knockout power to the test against sambo expert Dmitri Samoilov from Russia. When Jorge Masvidal and Steve Berger square off, it's a battle of brash confidence vs cool experience.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athlete's success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Rick Joslin as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Nick Gies is an elite athlete sports conditioning coach, specializing on initial acceleration mechanics. He trains Hard Knocks fighter Noah Ali to ensure that Noah is performing to the best of his abilities.

programme.desc: Antonio "Junior" Silva has dominated every one of his fights. Eric Pele may be the underdog, but he's riding his own winning streak. programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: O.G. smoker Wiz Khalifa tries to avoid blowing his high on the wings of death. As he and Sean Evans crank up the heat, Wiz breaks down his weed Olympics with Snoop Dogg and discusses his love for the Diplomats.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Anderson discusses opening for Beyonce, defends his Coldplay obsession and gives details on his new Dr. Dre-assisted album, "Oxnard."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: After a life completely devoid of spice, rapper Lil Yachty dives into the hot sauce deep end, trading in his usual meal of pepperoni pizza for ten scorching hot chicken tenders.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: E-40 is a hip-hop legend with more than three decades in the game - and he is ready to take on the heat.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Quavo follows in the footsteps of Offset and attempts to scale the heights of Mount Scoville, discussing everything from Jeff Goldblum fits to studio sessions with DJ Khaled to partying with Elon Musk along the way.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The L.A.-bred emcee discusses his love of golf and his favorite shabby-shabu restaurant. As the Scovilles crank, the hat comes off, the sweats starts pouring and Schoolboy earns respect for YG and Sean Evans.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The hometown hero takes on the wings of death in front of a live audience. Along the way, Juice WRLD talks about his dirt-bike obsession, the appeal of Percy Jackson novels and the reason you shouldn't pigeonhole SoundCloud rappers.

programme.title: Hot Ones
